name: Eric Sprinkle
description:
I’m an adventurous active man with a great sense of humor, honest, high energy, athletic, jeans and tee kind of guy who can clean up and look great in a shirt and tie. My pictures are recent and I do look like them. Hopefully better in person.
I am a great person to have a conversation with and even a better listener when you need one. I love to laugh and will do pretty much whatever I can in order to get someone to do it. If that means doing the worm across a dance floor then move the people to the side. Please allow me to have a few drinks before this happens. I am playful, considerate, driven, passionate, hopeless romantic and financially secure without the Powerball. I have the highest of Family values. I am a single Father and love my daughter more then life itself. she is my lifeline.
I’m looking for:
I am looking for the type of women that has been looking for this type of guy. I have the maturity and desire to be a faithful, vulnerable, intimate, sensual, loving, affectionate and a compassionate partner to the right person. I am proud to say that over the last couple of years I have re-discovered the things in life that really matter, the simple things. I do not have an empty space in my Heart that needs to be filled. I would like someone to compliment my life and not complicate it. If you feel that you would like a guy that has these qualities, then I hope to hear from you.
